title: 99/557/EC: Commission Decision of 22 July 1999 concerning a request for exemption submitted by Italy pursuant to Article 8(2)(c) of Council Directive 70/156/EEC on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to the type-approval of motor vehicles and their trailers (notified under document number C(1999) 2292)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 22 July 1999
concerning a request for exemption submitted by Italy pursuant to Article 8(2)(c) of Council Directive 70/156/EEC on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to the type-approval of motor vehicles and their trailers
(notified under document number C(1999) 2292)
(1999/557/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The request submitted by Italy for an exemption concerning the production and placing on the market of two class-M1 types of vehicle powered by compressed natural gas is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 July 1999.
For the Commission
Karel VAN MIERT
Member of the Commission
